stimulusHtml: The image is best understood in which of the following contexts of both the Second World War and the Cold War?

features.html: B-24 LIBERATOR BOMBERS NEARING COMPLETION AT THE CONSOLIDATED AIRCRAFT CORPORATION PLANT, FORT WORTH, TEXAS, 1942

choicesHtml: The greater ability of totalitarian regimes to mobilize their populations for war
The negative economic effects of excessive military spending
The ideological differences that informed both conflicts
The continued importance of industry in improving military capacity
